word: RAISED TO ONENESS WITH CHRIST.\97He [the believer] may die, as Christ died, but the life of the Saviour is in him. His life is hid with Christ in God. \93I am come that they might have life,\94 Jesus said, \93and that they might have it more abundantly.\94 He carries on the great process by which believers are made one with Him in this present life, to be one with Him throughout all eternity.
